description: Terracotta’s Louis Jacomet talks to us about data consistency and how developers’ requirements may differ from the consistency guarantees offered by providers. From an initial architecture and design outlook the most important rules should be determined by your business requirements, not the technical tools you’re using. They need to evolve over time in line with the complexity and success of your applications. Filmed at Devoxx Poland 2016.

title: Understand and Analyse Your Data Consistency
